name: The A-Line Romantic
description: A classic A-line gown crafted from layers of soft tulle, featuring a delicate lace bodice and a sweetheart neckline. Perfect for traditional and garden weddings.

name: The Sleek Mermaid
description: A modern, figure-hugging mermaid silhouette in Italian crepe, with a structured V-neck and a dramatic, flowing train.

name: The Ballgown Dream
description: An opulent ballgown with a voluminous skirt of organza and a beaded corset bodice. Designed for a princess moment.

name: The Minimalist Sheath
description: A refined sheath dress in heavy silk, featuring long sleeves and a simple boat neck, emphasizing clean lines and sophisticated tailoring.

name: Bohemian Goddess
description: Flowing chiffon gown with delicate crochet lace inserts, a deep plunging neckline, and bell sleeves for a free-spirited bride.

name: The High-Low Modern
description: A daring high-low hemline in structured mikado silk, perfect for showing off wedding shoes and offering modern elegance.

name: Princess Jasmine
description: A sophisticated fit-and-flare design covered entirely in intricate, beaded geometric lace. Features a dramatic illusion back.

name: City Hall Chic
description: A stylish knee-length cocktail dress made of embroidered satin, suitable for a civil ceremony or reception change.

name: The Regal Empire
description: A flowing gown with a high empire waist, chiffon skirt, and a structured, beaded sleeve that drapes elegantly over the shoulder.

name: The Jumpsuit Revolution
description: A dramatic, wide-leg bridal jumpsuit in white crepe, featuring an asymmetrical neckline and a detachable skirt train for versatility.

name: Glamorous Satin
description: A sleek, bias-cut slip dress made of luxurious silk satin, known for its figure-flattering drape and cowl back.

name: The Vintage Victorian
description: High-neck lace gown with long bishop sleeves and covered buttons down the back, perfect for a vintage-themed wedding.

name: The Tulle Cloud
description: A multi-layered dress featuring a structured bodice and a feather-light, dramatic skirt made of thousands of soft tulle folds.

name: The Two-Piece Dream
description: A modern two-piece set featuring a cropped lace top and a separate high-waisted, voluminous satin skirt.

name: The Deep V-Plunge
description: A daring crepe gown with a plunging mesh-supported V-neckline down to the waist and elegant cap sleeves.
